languages.text: At the start of combat, the cyber-eagle always starts to {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soar{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its maximum wounds at the start of each round.

traits.locale_text: The Cyber-Eagle always ascends at the start of the battle.

languages.text: At the start of combat and whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: В начале боя, а также по завершении {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}. Находясь {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} он восстанавливает 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: At the start of combat, the cyber-eagle always starts to {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soar{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its maximum wounds at the start of each round.

At the start of combat and whenever the Overseer ends their turn, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its maximum wounds at the start of each round.

At the start of combat and whenever the Overseer ends their turn, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its maximum wounds at the start of each round.

languages.text: В начале боя, а также по завершении {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}. Находясь {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} он восстанавливает 10% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: В начале боя, а также по завершении хода надзирателя киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}. Находясь {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, в начале каждого раунда он восстанавливает 10% от своего максимального здоровья.

В начале боя, а также по завершении хода надзирателя киберорел поднимается {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздух{/g}. Находясь {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}в воздухе{/g}, в начале каждого раунда он восстанавливает 10% от своего максимального здоровья.

languages.text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes und immer, wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet, beginnt der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisend{/g}. Während er {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, regeneriert er zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +10 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des Kampfes und immer, wenn der Aufseher seinen Zug beendet, beginnt der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisend{/g}. Während er {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, regeneriert er zu Beginn jeder Runde +10 % seiner maximalen Wunden.

Zu Beginn des Kampfes und immer, wenn der Aufseher seinen Zug beendet, beginnt der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisend{/g}. Während er {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, regeneriert er zu Beginn jeder Runde +10 % seiner maximalen Wunden.

Zu Beginn des Kampfes und immer, wenn der Aufseher seinen Zug beendet, beginnt der Cyber-Adler {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreisend{/g}. Während er {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}kreist{/g}, regeneriert er zu Beginn jeder Runde +10 % seiner maximalen Wunden.

languages.text: Au début du combat et chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} met fin à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le cyber-aigle prend systématiquement son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Il récupère ainsi +10 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}{/g}
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Au début du combat et chaque fois que le surveillant met fin à son tour, le cyber-aigle prend systématiquement son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Il récupère ainsi +10 % de ses blessures maximum au début de chaque round.{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}{/g}

Au début du combat et chaque fois que le surveillant met fin à son tour, le cyber-aigle prend systématiquement son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Il récupère ainsi +10 % de ses blessures maximum au début de chaque round.{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}{/g}

Au début du combat et chaque fois que le surveillant met fin à son tour, le cyber-aigle prend systématiquement son {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}envol{/g}. Il récupère ainsi +10 % de ses blessures maximum au début de chaque round.{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}{/g}

languages.text: 战斗开始时，以及每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时，生化猎鹰都会进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始时都会恢复10%{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 战斗开始时，以及每当监察官结束回合时，生化猎鹰都会进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，每轮开始时都会恢复10%最大生命值。
战斗开始时，生化猎鹰默认处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，每回合开始时都会恢复10%最大生命值。
战斗开始时，以及每当监察官结束回合时，生化猎鹰都会进入{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态。当生化猎鹰处于{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}腾空{/g}状态时，每轮开始时都会恢复10%最大生命值。

languages.text: Al principio del combate y al final de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}, la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}. Mientras está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, recupera un +10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Al principio del combate y al final de cada turno del supervisor, la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}. Mientras está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, recupera un +10 % de sus heridas máximas al principio de cada asalto.

Al principio del combate y al final de cada turno del supervisor, la ciberáguila se {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}eleva{/g}. Mientras está {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}elevada{/g}, recupera un +10 % de sus heridas máximas al principio de cada asalto.

languages.text: 戦闘開始時と、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を終了するたびに、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}の間、各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}開始時にその{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の+10%を回復する。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘開始時と、監督官がターンを終了するたびに、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}の間、各ラウンド開始時にその最大の傷の+10%を回復する。
戦闘開始時、サイバーイーグルは常に{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}の間、各ラウンド開始時にその最大の傷の+10%を回復する。
戦闘開始時と、監督官がターンを終了するたびに、サイバーイーグルは{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}を開始する。{g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}舞い上がり{/g}の間、各ラウンド開始時にその最大の傷の+10%を回復する。

languages.text: Siber kartal, çatışmanın başlangıcında ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} sonlandırdığında {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar. {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Yükselmişken{/g} her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundun{/g} başlangıcında {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının +%10'unu geri kazanır.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat and whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the cyber-eagle starts {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}. While {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}soaring{/g}, it regains +10% of its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Siber kartal, çatışmanın başlangıcında ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} sonlandırdığında {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar. {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Yükselmişken{/g} her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raundun{/g} başlangıcında {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının +%10'unu geri kazanır.

Siber kartal, çatışmanın başlangıcında ve {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g} her turunu sonlandırdığında {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}yükselmeye{/g} başlar. {g|f:ec56854df2e84ef196a49079a43b5211}Yükselmişken{/g} her raundun başlangıcında maksimum sağlık puanının +%10'unu geri kazanır.
